reviewText: I purchased this because I use a screensaver on my 55" wall-mounted TV when I entertain.  I use the Yule Log in Winter and Plasma Screen in the spring and summer.  I was looking for something for the fall and purchased this DVD.  None of the scenes available were as rich or warm as the Yule Log or Plasma Screen DVDs.  It just wasn't my view of what I was looking for in Autumn visuals.
